title: Recall Notification Report
summary: WASHINGTON, Oct. 27, 2011 - Original Fried Pies, Inc., a Davis, Okla., establishment, is recalling approximately 8,888 pounds of frozen meat and poultry pie products, the U.S. Department of Agriculture's (USDA) Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today because they are misbranded and contain...

establishment.name: Original Fried Pies
establishment.address:
I-35 at Hwy 77, Exit 51 
  Davis, OK 73030

impacted_products: 4-pound sealed bags of "CHEESE SAUCE WITH EGG & SAUSAGE."
